title: Externalized property values for Static Analysis Results Format (SARIF) Version 2.0.0 JSON Schema
description: JSON schema for files that contain the value of an externalized SARIF property.

$schema.description: A URI from which this schema can be obtained.

version.description: The SARIF format version of the log file from which the property was externalized.

runInstanceGuid.description: The instanceGuid of the run to which the externalized property belongs.

propertyName.description: The name of the externalized property.

propertySchema.description: The schema to which the externalized property conforms, expressed as a fragment within the master SARIF schema.

propertyValue.description: The value of the externalized property
